meanings.definition: A person who receives benefits, profits, or advantages
meanings.sent1: The beneficiaries of the charity were grateful for the help they received.
meanings.sent2: The beneficiaries of the scholarship program were able to pursue their education.
meanings.sent3: The beneficiaries of the bake sale were overjoyed with the delicious treats they got.
meanings.sent4: The beneficiaries of the mentorship program flourished like flowers in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The beneficiaries of the new technology felt like they had won the lottery.

meanings.definition: Those who are entitled to receive property or funds from a will or trust
meanings.sent1: The beneficiaries of the will inherited the family heirlooms with great joy.
meanings.sent2: The beneficiaries of the trust received their financial assets as per the legal document.
meanings.sent3: The beneficiaries of the estate sale were surprised by the valuable items they acquired.
meanings.sent4: The beneficiaries of the trust fund blossomed like seeds planted in fertile soil.
meanings.sent5: The beneficiaries of the inheritance felt like they had struck gold.
